events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and will start reviewing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and engineer found in the resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to follow up with the candidate and coordinate the next steps in our hiring process.
The initial screening call was conducted; the candidate showed strong interest and demonstrated relevant software engineering skills.
Candidate responded promptly to scheduling interviews and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week, allowing us to further assess the candidateâ€™s engineering capabilities.
